keyMoments.title: Elephant Gatling Barrage on Noah
keyMoments.description: Luffy unleashes a relentless barrage of Elephant Gatling attacks on Noah, demonstrating improved control over Gear Third post-timeskip with no shrinking side effect.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's determination to save Fish-Man Island and his mastery of Gear Third after the two-year training.

keyMoments.title: Wounds Reopen from Overexertion
keyMoments.description: Luffy's wounds from the battle with Hody Jones reopen due to the intense strain of continuously using Gear Third, but he dismisses them as long as everyone is safe.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's selfless heroism and willingness to sacrifice his own well-being for others.
keyMoments.quote: It's okay... as long as the ship stopped and everyone is safe.

keyMoments.title: Faints from Exhaustion
keyMoments.description: After expending all his energy saving Fish-Man Island, Luffy loses consciousness and falls back toward Noah.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the climactic conclusion of Luffy's heroic rescue of Fish-Man Island.

abilities.description: Luffy demonstrates the ability to use Gear Third repeatedly without the shrinking side effect, maintaining a sustained barrage of giant fist attacks on Noah.

reveals.information: Luffy has mastered Gear Third post-timeskip and no longer shrinks after using it

keyMoments.title: Stops Luffy from Destroying Noah
keyMoments.description: Shirahoshi jumps in front of Luffy and pleads with him to stop attacking Noah, showing her concern for both Luffy's wellbeing and the preservation of the ancient ship.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Shirahoshi's growing courage and her emotional connection to both Luffy and the historical significance of Noah.
keyMoments.quote: Please stop, Luffy! You don't have to destroy it anymore!

keyMoments.title: Unconsciously Summons Sea Kings
keyMoments.description: Shirahoshi's strong emotional desire to save both Luffy and Noah unconsciously summons six massive Sea Kings who halt Noah's descent by grabbing its chains.
keyMoments.significance: First clear demonstration of Shirahoshi's awakened power as the Ancient Weapon Poseidon, though she doesn't yet understand or control it consciously.

keyMoments.title: Communicates with Sea Kings
keyMoments.description: The Sea Kings speak telepathically to Shirahoshi, explaining they were guided by her strong feelings. Shirahoshi is surprised, not realizing she had called them.
keyMoments.significance: Confirms Shirahoshi's ability to communicate with Sea Kings through the Voice of All Things, a key attribute of Poseidon.
keyMoments.quote: But... I didn't do anything to call you here...

abilities.description: Shirahoshi can unconsciously summon and communicate telepathically with Sea Kings through her strong emotions and the Voice of All Things. This is the power of the Ancient Weapon Poseidon.

reveals.information: Shirahoshi's power as Poseidon has awakened - she can summon and communicate with Sea Kings through her emotions
Shirahoshi doesn't yet consciously understand or control her power to command Sea Kings

keyMoments.title: Apology to Joy Boy
keyMoments.description: King Neptune apologizes to the memory of Joy Boy for having to break the 800-year-old promise to keep Noah safe, choosing to prioritize the lives of his people over the ancient oath.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Neptune's knowledge of the ancient promise between Joy Boy and Fish-Man Island, and the historical significance of Noah as the Ship of Promise.
keyMoments.quote: Forgive us, Joy Boy... We have no choice but to destroy Noah.

reveals.information: Neptune knows about the ancient promise between Joy Boy and Fish-Man Island regarding Noah
Neptune was befriended by Whitebeard approximately 20+ years ago when Whitebeard declared Fish-Man Island his territory

name.japanese: エドワード・ニューゲート

keyMoments.title: Whitebeard Claims Fish-Man Island (Flashback)
keyMoments.description: In a flashback, Whitebeard is shown arriving at Fish-Man Island and befriending King Neptune before declaring the island under his protection as his territory, ending the attacks and discrimination the island faced.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals how Whitebeard's protection kept Fish-Man Island safe for decades and establishes a parallel between Whitebeard and Luffy as protectors of the island.
keyMoments.quote: This island is now under my protection!

relationships.description: Whitebeard befriended King Neptune and protected Fish-Man Island as his territory for decades.

evolutionMoments.description: Flashback reveals Whitebeard declaring Fish-Man Island under his protection and befriending Neptune.

reveals.information: Whitebeard claimed Fish-Man Island as his territory approximately 20+ years before the current timeline, befriending Neptune and ending the island's persecution

keyMoments.title: Scales Appears to Stop Noah
keyMoments.description: Scales, one of the six Sea Kings, appears alongside Mottled, Birdy, Googly-Eyed, Topknot, and Underbite to grab Noah's chains and halt its descent toward Fish-Man Island.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of Scales, one of the ancient Sea Kings who can communicate with Shirahoshi/Poseidon.

abilities.description: As a Sea King, Scales can communicate telepathically with those who possess the Voice of All Things, particularly Shirahoshi/Poseidon.

relationships.description: Scales is one of the Sea Kings who responds to Shirahoshi's unconscious summons as the Ancient Weapon Poseidon.

evolutionMoments.description: Scales appears with other Sea Kings in response to Shirahoshi's emotional call to help Luffy and stop Noah.

reveals.information: Scales is one of the ancient Sea Kings capable of telepathic communication and responds to Poseidon's power

name.japanese: ホーディ・ジョーンズ

keyMoments.title: Shown Defeated
keyMoments.description: Hody Jones is shown lying unconscious and defeated after his battle with Luffy, along with all the other members of the New Fish-Man Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the end of Hody's threat to Fish-Man Island and the conclusion of his role as the arc's primary antagonist.
